text: Inon kasone hastand, ki ʙa eşon kitoʙu hikmat va nuʙuvvat ʙaxşidem. Pas, [ej pajomʙar] agar inon [ muşrikon] ʙa in [pajomʙaron va kitoʙhoi ilohī] kufr ʙivarzand, hatman, gurūh [-i muhoçirin va ansor va toʙein]-ro ʙar [hifzu nigahʙonii] on [usulu aqoid] megumorem, ki nisʙat ʙa on kofir naʙoşand
